subject: Re: [junit] Pop-Up windows and Page refreshes
msgSnippet: ... Have you tried HtmlUnit or jWebUnit? I suppose that, since jWebUnit builds on HttpUnit, then it may not help, but you never know. Regarding the pop-up
messageBody:
Bharath Khambadkone wrote:

> I'm very new at this, Another team at my work place has been using this
> Httpunit/junit for testing their app. Our management decided to use the
> same framework they had and when i was trying to create xml flows i was
> not able to get past these pages as junit/http unit could not set focus
> on the pop up windows and when i contacted the other team they told me
> that functionality had not ben built into the framework. So i was not
> sure if we could handle pop up windows and page refreshed. I would
> really appreciate if you could let me know how its done. And thanks for
> your quick response.

Have you tried HtmlUnit or jWebUnit? I suppose that, since jWebUnit
builds on HttpUnit, then it may not help, but you never know.

Regarding the pop-up windows, what are you testing? Does your test need
to know that these windows are popping up, or could you simply test the
pop-up windows by navigating to them directly? If you could do that,
then you could avoid the problem of setting focus on them.

Take care.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
